title: Hybrid/Dual Design Studio Learning Architecture

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic design studio theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling and mobile-optimized content required for working professional learners

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative design studio projects in hybrid environments.
Learners can design instructional processes by integrating online and offline components.
Learners can exchange feedback using digital tools even in constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
